column2: 1. Erect and dismantle supported type scaffold
column4: Enumerate the different site rules and regulations in erecting scaffold Discuss the importance of work instruction and associated activities Describe scaffold components, tools and equipment are identified, checked and segregated Understand scaffold type and its capacity Identifying and reporting obstructions and hazards in the job site Prepare scaffold sketches Understanding the factors affecting productivity Practicing 3R and 5S
column6: Observation of practical skills Written test Oral questioning
